channel.title: LLMs on amar
channel.description: Recent content in LLMs on amar

item.title: Removing Barriers
item.description: One of the nice things about LLMs and their ability to “program” things is that it really make it easier to iterate and test out ideas for small applications. I’ve been using LLMs on and off in order to figure out where in my workflow these tools have a place (and where to not include them at all). When kept on a short leash, they c16:18an rapidly remove barriers to creating applications for personal use.
